definition: clamor raises the dust (idiom); a tremendous clamor/to raise a tremendous stink
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: The debate has only intensified in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 最近幾周以來這個爭論甚囂塵上了。

sentences.english: Suspicion has reached such a pitch that a decision will have to be made immediately.
sentences.chinese: 各種猜疑甚囂塵上，以至必須立即做出決定。

sentences.english: In the South, there is open talk of “liberating” the North.
sentences.chinese: 而南朝鮮的“解放北方”的叫囂，也是甚囂塵上。
